data.name: Chambered Demo
data.detailed_description:
This is a demo for Chambered, a single-player, story-based VR shooting game.

You play as a new recruit on Kochova Station going through the first day of Virtual Arena Training when the ship is taken captive. You need to fight your way through the training arenas before it's too late. The whole station is counting on you. Can you escape The Chamber?

Demo Features:
  • 4 guns to unlock and shoot, each with 6 attachments and skins to earn.
  • Gunrange + tutorial, one replayable arena.
  • Designed for trackpad locomotion (Move-In-Place also supported)

Please note: This game is single-player ONLY. Chambered pits you against AI so you never have to worry about empty lobbies.

data.short_description: The demo for Chambered, a single-player, story-based VR shooting game with a focus on weapon progression. Featuring trackpad locomotion, 4 unique guns, and 40+ weapon mods, the Chambered demo is a showcase of what you can expect from the full version.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-6700k
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 980 / AMD Radeon™ R9 380 equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
